info.description: REST API generated from CUE ontology. All endpoints accept/return JSON.
info.title: Propeller Property Management API

post.summary: Assign a role to a person
Activate a pending person role (transitions to "active")
Deactivate an active person role (transitions to "inactive")
Activate a portfolio after onboarding (transitions to "active")
Activate a property after onboarding (transitions to "active")
Create a new unit within a property
Submit lease draft for approval (transitions to "pending_approval")
Terminate a lease early. Requires reason for audit trail (transitions to "terminated")
Post a journal entry. Lines must balance (debits = credits) (transitions to "posted")
Void a posted journal entry. Creates reversal entry (transitions to "voided")
